issue.title: [CF 1237] DK Ignore Runes doesn't work
issue.body:
On both Frost and Unholy spec, haven't tried Blood, the Ignore Runes checkbox doesn't work for any icons. If  all runes are on cooldown the icons show as being on cooldown regardless if the box is ticked or not. Using verison 8.0.3.


> Posted by CurseForge user Wedgezilla | Imported from CurseForge issue #1237 | Raw
